data.subject: Time Walk
data.lyric:
Morning breeze
 blowing my hair
 into single piece
 Take me away
 Thousand days
 flying by my side

data.subject: Come With Me
data.lyric:
Free your soul of the past
 Love and the despair
 Don't hold your breath
 Close your eyes and dream
